SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SET UP AND MAINTAIN NET ZERO CLOUD
Predictions for Carbon Emission and Fuel Consumption of Stationary Assets

Decrease your company’s carbon footprint by predicting the carbon emissions and fuel consumption of your stationary assets for a specific year. Show predicted data in the stationary asset environmental source record pages by embedding dashboards.

Enable CRM Analytics and Assign Permission Sets
Enable CRM Analytics, assign permission sets to admins and users, and set field-level security for all the required fields.
Internal and External Stationary Asset Data
Sync the necessary features from specific objects. Prepare the external stationary asset features that are used by the Einstein Discovery model to generate predictions, import the features into CRM Analytics, and then sync the features.
Create an App to Predict Carbon Emission and Fuel Consumption of Stationary Assets
Use the Stationary Asset Energy Consumption template to create an app that generates predictions about carbon emissions and fuel consumption of your stationary assets for a specific year.
Update of the Stationary Assets’ Carbon Emission and Fuel Consumption Prediction Recipes
Customize recipes to use additional features from your data model. Ensure that the recipes are run in the order listed in this table.
Add Energy Consumption Dashboards to Net Zero Pages
Show interactive visualizations of predicted stationary asset energy consumption data by adding dashboards to Net Zero pages. You can add the Predicted Carbon Emissions for Stationary Assets dashboard to the stationary asset environmental source record page and the Predicted Carbon Emissions and Fuel Consumption by Stationary Assets dashboard to the Home page.
